[vc_row et_full_width=”true” et_row_padding=”true” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”stretch” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1650948552037{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #000000 url(https://prestigecars.co.id/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/IMG_8044eoverlay-1.jpg?id=8009) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”video-bg-row”][vc_column][vc_row_inner et_max_width=”” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1650444907096{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1650866792824{padding-right: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 20% !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”animation bottom-to-top”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row et_full_width=”true” et_row_padding=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1588128835660{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” el_class=”align-center”][vc_column_inner animation=”animation left-to-right” offset=”vc_col-md-7″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner animation=”animation right-to-left” offset=”vc_col-md-5″ css=”.vc_custom_1578532669392{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]
Our History

Prestige Image Motorcars

We pledge to give you the best quality of service for all exotic car brands in Indonesia. We believe every current and prospective luxury automobile owner has a desire for that personal touch. Our six stars services is an experience designed to satisfy all of our customers. Our formula for success is our devotion to details.

It’s our passion and what motivates us to assist our customers to create something extraordinary. It’s how unique motorcars continue to be made available direct from the factory. How do we do it? With originality, inspiration, and enthusiasm, beginning as early as the consultation stage.[/vc_column_text]

0

Customers

Satisfied customers worldwide and growing

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row et_full_width=”true” et_row_padding=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1650445291904{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;background-color: #000000 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”white” el_width=”80″ css=”.vc_custom_1650449850181{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_row_inner et_column_align=”align-center” equal_height=”yes” el_class=”align-center”][vc_column_inner animation=”animation bottom-to-top” offset=”vc_col-lg-5″][vc_column_text]
Est. 2012

Our Story

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1650958439698{padding-top: -1000px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Prestige Motorcars was founded in 2012 by Mr. Rudy Salim in Jakarta, Indonesia. We have more than 8 years of experience of distributing high-end automotive brands, especially sports-cars and supercars. Well-known global brands such as Renault, Ferrari, Lamborghini and Porsche, among many others, are displayed, marketed and sold to our clients at an exponential rate each year.

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row et_full_width=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1650878471500{padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #000000 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner et_column_color=”et-light-column” width=”1/4″][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]
0

IDR TRILLIONS

Total Sales

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner et_column_color=”et-light-column” width=”1/4″][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]

AUTOMOTIVE BRANDS

Various brands with 2 sole importer license

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row et_full_width=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1650871862004{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #000000 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner et_column_align=”align-center” css=”.vc_custom_1578532916555{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_column_inner animation=”animation bottom-to-top” offset=”vc_col-lg-6″][vc_column_text]
Values
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner et_column_align=”align-center”][vc_column_inner animation=”animation bottom-to-top” offset=”vc_col-lg-8″]

Team work

Unique

Smart

Trust-worthy

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row et_full_width=”true” et_row_padding=”true” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”stretch” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1650871538809{background-color: #000000 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”video-bg-row”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”white” el_width=”80″ css=”.vc_custom_1650449850181{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column et_column_color=”et-light-column” offset=”vc_col-md-6″][vc_row_inner et_max_width=”” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1562734895463{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1650871698692{padding-right: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20% !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”animation bottom-to-top”]
Prestige Motorcars

VISION

  • Provide the best customer oriented services with continuous innovation
  • Display high integrity and proactive attitude based on positive paradigm
  • Continuously improve
  • World class business process as a contribution and responsibility to all stakeholders
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column parallax=”content-moving” el_class=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-6″][vc_row_inner et_max_width=”” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1562734895463{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1650871625221{padding-right: 20% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 20% !important;}”][vc_column_text animation=”animation bottom-to-top”]

MISSION
